summary: The video shows a person speaking directly to the camera in what appears to be a dimly lit indoor setting. The speaker discusses their intention to move the activity outdoors due to the weather being around 65-70 degrees. They express uncertainty about how well the lighting will work outside but decide to proceed anyway. The speaker seems to be addressing an audience, possibly for a recording or live stream, and mentions that they can already see something, indicating preparation for an outdoor shoot.
keywords: outdoors, lighting, 65 degrees, 70 degrees, uncertainty, recording, live stream, preparation
